CustomField.description: Enables the Chatter sent to the Customer Reference Team public group notifying them that the Opportunity Owner has not responded in the specified timeframe to the "Are they referenceable yet?" notification.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables the Chatter sent to the Customer Reference Team public group notifying them that the Opportunity Owner has not responded in the specified timeframe to the "Are they referenceable yet?" notification.
CustomField.label: Reference Lead No Response Chatter
